title: Corda State Manager Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the State Manager section. This configures the interactions of the workers with the underlying underlying persistent storage used by the out of process State Manager.

type.description: The type of state manager implementation.

$comment: Polymorphic state manager storage connection configuration. The valid section depends on which state manager implementation is in use.

databaseProperties.description: Settings to connect to the State Manager Database.
